recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM-DECISION and ORDER.  The Court hereby ORDERS that Plaintiffs' unopposed Motion for Final Approval of Proposed Class Action Settlement,  Dkt. No.  41 , is GRANTED.  The Court further ORDERS that Plaintiffs' unopposed Motion for At torneys' Fees, Dkt. No.  42 , is GRANTED.  The Court further ORDERS that the Clerk of the Court shall enter judgment, dismiss the case with prejudice and close the case.  The Court further ORDERS that the Clerk serve a copy of this Memorandum-Decision and Order on the parties in accordance with the Local Rules. Signed by U.S. District Judge Anne M. Nardacci on 2/13/2025.  (mab)
